original: @#/_/dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i🔽sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: @#/_/dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/

analyzed: /  @/_dpal ldan lha mo'i gsang sgrub rje na ro pas mdzad pa bzhugs so/_/ @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shi ya de bi ma ha ka li sgo h+ya pa d+ha na ma/_bod
translated: The Secret Practice of the Great Goddess

original: skad du/_dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: skad du/_dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The Secret Practice of the Great Goddess

original: dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/lha mo'i gsang ba'i bsgrub thabs
analyzed: dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/lha mo'i gsang ba'i bsgrub thabs
translated: Homage to the Great Goddess!🔽The secret practice of the Great Goddess is taught in three parts: approach, accomplishment, and activity.

original: ni/_/bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor gsum gyis bstan/_/de las dang po snyen pa ni/_/
analyzed: ni/_/bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor gsum gyis bstan/_/de las dang po snyen pa ni/_/
translated: The first, the approach, is as follows:🔽The practitioner who possesses the characteristics,

original: mtshhan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos/_/yid 'ong dbyen pa'i gnas dag tu/_/
analyzed: mtshhan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos/_/yid 'ong dbyen pa'i gnas dag tu/_/
translated: in a pleasing and secluded place,🔽on an auspicious day, time, and lunar mansion,

original: gza' skar dus tshhod bzang po la/_/nang gtor phyi gtor btang nas kyang /_/
analyzed: gza' skar dus tshhod bzang po la/_/nang gtor phyi gtor btang nas kyang /_/
translated: having offered the inner and outer torma,🔽makes supplications and recites the truth,

original: gsol ba gdab cing bden pa bdar/_/phyi nang gsang gsum rten rnams bca'//
analyzed: gsol ba gdab cing bden pa bdar/_/phyi nang gsang gsum rten rnams bca'//
translated: and sets up the outer, inner, and secret supports.

original: brten gtor rgyun gtor rten rnams bca'/_/de nas 'tshhams bcad man+dal bya//
analyzed: brten gtor rgyun gtor rten rnams bca'/_/de nas 'tshhams bcad man+dal bya//
translated: Then, after the debate, make the mandala.🔽You should generate yourself as the meditation deity and in front of you

original: bdag nyid sems bskyed lhag lhar bai/_/mdun du rgyu las gzhal yas khang /_/
analyzed: bdag nyid sems bskyed lhag lhar bai/_/mdun du rgyu las gzhal yas khang /_/
translated: the celestial mansion arises from the cause.🔽In the middle of the skull fortress, in the center of fire and wind,

original: de nang thod mkhar me rlung dbus/_/hum las bskyed pa'i lha mo ni/_/sku mdog
analyzed: de nang thod mkhar me rlung dbus/_/hum las bskyed pa'i lha mo ni/_/sku mdog
translated: is the goddess generated from the syllable hūṃ.🔽Her body is

original: nag la shin tu bsgeg_/zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/zhal gnyis btshan
analyzed: nag la shin tu bsgeg_/zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/_/zhal gnyis btshan
translated: black and very wrathful. She has one face and four arms.🔽Her two right hands hold a sword and a skull cup.

original: dkyil brjid tshhul gnas/_/g.yas gnyis ral gri b+han d+ha bsnams/_/g.yon🔽gnyis shags ti rtshe gsum thog_/mi ro khar bcug mche bzhi gtshigs/_/spyan
analyzed: dkyil brjid tshhul gnas/_/g.yas gnyis ral gri b+han d+ha bsnams/_/g.yon gnyis shags ti rtshe gsum thog_/mi ro khar bcug mche bzhi gtshigs/_/spyan
translated: Her two left hands hold a shield and a battle-ax.🔽She bares her four fangs, biting into a human corpse.🔽She has three eyes and her hair is bound up on top of her head.

original: gsum dbu skra gyen du brdzes/_/snyan g.yas sbrul dang g.yon seng ldeng /_/dur
analyzed: gsum dbu skra gyen du brdzes/_/snyan g.yas sbrul dang g.yon seng ldeng /_/dur
translated: Her right ear is adorned with a snake and her left ear with a sandalwood tree.🔽She is adorned with the eight charnel ground ornaments.

original: khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan/_/klu chen gshib pa'i ske rags can/_/zhabs
analyzed: khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan/_/klu chen gshib pa'i ske rags can/_/zhabs
translated: She wears a belt made of the necks of great nāgas.🔽Her two feet are adorned with iron anklets.

original: gnyis lcags sgrogs dag gi brgyan/_/bong bu dmar gwa'i steng nyid du/_/
analyzed: gnyis lcags sgrogs dag gi brgyan/_/bong bu dmar gwa'i steng nyid du/_/
translated: She sits upon a red ass.

original: btshan dkyil brjid pa'i tshhul gyi 'gyings/_/gru gsum b+h+yoh nag gsum las yangs//
analyzed: btshan dkyil brjid pa'i tshhul gyi 'gyings/_/gru gsum b+h+yoh nag gsum las yangs//
translated: wider than the three dark triangles.🔽The black, naked one with dreadlocks,

original: nag mo gcer bu ral pa can/_/g.yas pas mi snying g.yon b+han d+ha/_/dur
analyzed: nag mo gcer bu ral pa can/_/g.yas pas mi snying g.yon b+han d+ha/_/dur
translated: holds a human heart in the right hand and a skull cup in the left.🔽She has the eight charnel ground accessories and rides a donkey.

original: khrod chas brgyad bong bu bcibs/_/de rgyab rigs bzhi'i lha mo ni/_/dkar
analyzed: khrod chas brgyad bong bu bcibs/_/de rgyab rigs bzhi'i lha mo ni/_/dkar
translated: Behind her are the goddesses of the four families,🔽white, yellow, red and green, riding donkeys.

original: ser dmar ljang bong bu bcibs/_/g.yas pas rang rtags g.yon b+han d+ha/_/
analyzed: ser dmar ljang bong bu bcibs/_/g.yas pas rang rtags g.yon b+han d+ha/_/
translated: They hold their own emblems in the right hands and skull cups in the left.🔽Behind them are the eight piśācīs,

original: de rgyab phra men brgyad po yang /_/seng stag spyang ki cung ka dang /_/phag gdong
analyzed: de rgyab phra men brgyad po yang /_/seng stag spyang ki cung ka dang /_/phag gdong
translated: with the faces of a lion, tiger, wolf, jackal,

original: dur bya bya rog bya rgod gdong /_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri dang thod pa 'dzin/_/
analyzed: dur bya bya rog bya rgod gdong /_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri dang thod pa 'dzin/_/
translated: pig, vulture, owl and crow. They have one face and two hands, holding a knife and a skull cup.

original: dur khrod chas brgyad drel nag rkang gsum bcib/_/de rgyab las byed pho nya rkang
analyzed: dur khrod chas brgyad drel nag rkang gsum bcib/_/de rgyab las byed pho nya rkang
translated: They have the eight charnel ground accessories and ride three-legged black donkeys.🔽Behind them are the male and female messengers of action,🔽with the faces of a crow, a wolf, a monkey and a black mule. They hold a bow and arrow

original: ka'i gdong /_/stag dang spyang ki spre'u drel nag zhon/_/phyag mtshhan mda' gzhu
analyzed: ka'i gdong /_/stag dang spyang ki spre'u drel nag zhon/_/phyag mtshhan mda' gzhu
translated: and a sword and skull cup.

original: spu gri b+han d+ha dang /_/sbrul zhags b+han d+ha rgyu zhags nad rkyal bsnam/_/de rgyab
analyzed: spu gri b+han d+ha dang /_/sbrul zhags b+han d+ha rgyu zhags nad rkyal bsnam/_/de rgyab
translated: The sword, the noose, the skull, the noose of snakes, and the bag of disease.🔽Behind him, surrounded by a hundred thousand actionists,

original: las mkhan bye ba 'bum gyis bskor/_/gtsho bo'i sa bon hum nyid 'khor rnams sbyo//
analyzed: las mkhan bye ba 'bum gyis bskor/_/gtsho bo'i sa bon hum nyid 'khor rnams sbyo//
translated: the seed syllable of the ocean, the syllable hūṃ, is connected to the retinue.🔽The three seed syllables bless, and the wisdom being is quickly invoked.

original: 'bru gsum byin rlab ye shes myur du gzhug_/sngags kyis phreng bas kha dog so
analyzed: 'bru gsum byin rlab ye shes myur du gzhug_/sngags kyis phreng bas kha dog so
translated: The mantra garland is clearly visualized in its respective color.🔽The emanation and reabsorption of light rays are requested from the gurus.

original: sor gsal/_/'od zer spro bsdu bla ma dag las dris/_/srog bzung srog bsdu
analyzed: sor gsal/_/'od zer spro bsdu bla ma dag las dris/_/srog bzung srog bsdu
translated: The life force is seized, the life force is gathered,🔽and the life force is taken from the center.

original: srog gis dkyil nas blang /_/gtor mchod stod skul dus bzhir byas nas kyang //
analyzed: srog gis dkyil nas blang /_/gtor mchod stod skul dus bzhir byas nas kyang //
translated: The torma offering and praise are performed four times a day,🔽and the supplication for whatever is desired is done once.

original: gang 'dod gsol gdab rtshe gcig dmigs pa bya/_/gtsho 'khor 'od du e yi
analyzed: gang 'dod gsol gdab rtshe gcig dmigs pa bya/_/gtsho 'khor 'od du e yi
translated: The retinue dissolves into light in the place of the syllable e.🔽The e itself becomes the source of phenomena, in the center of which is the goddess.

original: gnas su bstim/_/e nyid chos 'byung de dbus lha mo bye/_/'khor rnams skor
analyzed: gnas su bstim/_/e nyid chos 'byung de dbus lha mo bye/_/'khor rnams skor
translated: The retinue surrounds her.

original: dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
analyzed: dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
translated: The Secret Sādhana of the Glorious Great Goddess🔽In the center of the maṇḍala,

original: ba skor ba'i tshhul nyid du/_/'od kyi spro bsdu'i dmigs pa dag la 'bad/_/de
analyzed: ba skor ba'i tshhul nyid du/_/'od kyi spro bsdu'i dmigs pa dag la 'bad/_/de
translated: one should exert oneself in the visualization of the emanation and reabsorption of light.

original: ltar byas pas bdun nam nges med na/_/lha mo gtsho 'khor zhal mthong gsung
analyzed: ltar byas pas bdun nam nges med na/_/lha mo gtsho 'khor zhal mthong gsung
translated: If one does it this way, it is said that the vision of the goddess and her retinue will come in seven days or else after an indefinite period.

original: yang thos/_/'bring gis nyams dang tha ma rmi lam ste/_/lus dang grib ma ltar
analyzed: yang thos/_/'bring gis nyams dang tha ma rmi lam ste/_/lus dang grib ma ltar
translated: The middling will have visions, and the least will have dreams,

original: 'khor ci bsam 'grub/
analyzed: 'khor ci bsam 'grub/
translated: and one will be able to accomplish whatever one wishes.

original: de ltar bsnyen bsgrub bya ba ni/_/phung pa rnams la brub khung gru gsum bya/_/
analyzed: de ltar bsnyen bsgrub bya ba ni/_/phung pa rnams la brub khung gru gsum bya/_/
translated: In this way, for the practice of approach and accomplishment, one should make a triangular pit for the corpse.

original: ling ga gzugs brnyan dug khrag gis bskus nas/_/brub khang nag po'i nang du
analyzed: ling ga gzugs brnyan dug khrag gis bskus nas/_/brub khang nag po'i nang du
translated: Having smeared the effigy with poison and blood, one should place it in the black pit.🔽Having placed it in the skull of the one whom one desires, one should summon and absorb it, separating it from the deity.

original: gzhug par bya/_/gang 'dod thod par bcug nas su/_/dgug gzhug lha dang dbye ba bya/_/mtshhon dang thun rdzas ting 'dzin ldan pas brabs/_/lcags kyis
analyzed: gzhug par bya/_/gang 'dod thod par bcug nas su/_/dgug gzhug lha dang dbye ba bya/_/mtshhon dang thun rdzas ting 'dzin ldan pas brabs/_/lcags kyis
translated: One should strike it with the weapon and the weapon substances, being endowed with meditative concentration.

original: sdig pa phyag mtshhan cho ga bya/_/dzahlas spyang mo hum las da ki ma/_/spro zhing🔽bsad bcad gtub pa'i las byas bsam/_/de dus lha mo'i chibs pa rtag tu
analyzed: sdig pa phyag mtshhan cho ga bya/_/dzahlas spyang mo hum las da ki ma/_/spro zhing bsad bcad gtub pa'i las byas bsam/_/de dus lha mo'i chibs pa rtag tu
translated: One should perform the rite of the iron hook, the hand implement, and emanate🔽and🔽think that one performs the actions of killing, cutting, and chopping.

original: bsgyur/_/rang nyid der bye pho nya las la mngag_/bsnyen bsgrub sngags ni
analyzed: bsgyur/_/rang nyid der bye pho nya las la mngag_/bsnyen bsgrub sngags ni
translated: At that time, one should always change the goddess’s mount, and one should send oneself there as a messenger to the action.🔽The mantra for the approach and accomplishment is:

original: 'di nyid dag gis shes/_/om hum shi ya de bi ka li ka li ma ca ka li ha ka li hum ma
analyzed: 'di nyid dag gis shes/_/om hum shi ya de bi ka li ka li ma ca ka li ha ka li hum ma
translated: One should know this.🔽Om hum shi ya devi kali kali ma cha kali ha kali hum ma🔽Tsitra hrīṃ hrīṃ jhaḥ jhaḥ bhyoḥ e a ra li hrīṃ jhaḥ samaya bhyoḥ

original: ha tshi ta hring hring dzahdzahb+h+yo e a ra li hri dzahsa ma ya b+h+yoh/_om e ma ha ka li de bi
analyzed: ha tshi ta hring hring dzahdzahb+h+yo e a ra li hri dzahsa ma ya b+h+yoh/_om e ma ha ka li de bi
translated: Om e ma ha kali devi

original: ka ra li b+hi kan tra rag ti tshan d+ha ru pi ni hum phat/_bsnyen dus nyin mtshhan bye
analyzed: ka ra li b+hi kan tra rag ti tshan d+ha ru pi ni hum phat/_bsnyen dus nyin mtshhan bye
translated: Kara li bhi kaṃtra rakta tsan dhara rūpi ni hum phaṭ.

original: brag shes par bya/_/sbad bsad gcig tu dril ba 'di ltar ro/_/ma mo snying la🔽raka sha_/ma raka sha_/raka mo snying kha rag_/khrag la ma dun dun drag ma
analyzed: brag shes par bya/_/sbad bsad gcig tu dril ba 'di ltar ro/_/ma mo snying la raka sha_/ma raka sha_/raka mo snying kha rag_/khrag la ma dun dun drag ma
translated: One should know the difference between day and night during the recitation.🔽The killing of the rakshasa is summarized as follows:🔽Raksha rakṣa rakṣa mo snying kha rag🔽Khrag la ma dun dun drag ma🔽Rak snying tre kye ma ma ru lu la stso bhyoḥ

original: raka snying tre kye ma ma ru lu la stsho b+h+yoh/_snying kha rag sa ma ya dam dam dzahdzahma ma ma hring
analyzed: raka snying tre kye ma ma ru lu la stsho b+h+yoh/_snying kha rag sa ma ya dam dam dzahdzahma ma ma hring
translated: Snying kha rag sa ma ya dam dam jhaḥ jhaḥ ma ma hriṃ🔽Tsit la thun🔽Snying khrag la ma thun

original: tshi ta la thun/_snying khrag la ma thun/_shi to ta snying la ya ya ma blo/_ma ma sha
analyzed: tshi ta la thun/_snying khrag la ma thun/_shi to ta snying la ya ya ma blo/_ma ma sha
translated: Shi to ta snying la ya ya ma blo🔽Ma ma sha🔽Sha ma hriṃ ma ma sa ma ya

original: sha ma hri ma ma sa ma ya/_dgra bo rni ma ra ya sod sod ma tshi ta dza la ram/_tshi ta
analyzed: sha ma hri ma ma sa ma ya/_dgra bo rni ma ra ya sod sod ma tshi ta dza la ram/_tshi ta
translated: Dgra bo rni ma ra ya sod sod ma tshi ta ja la ram🔽Tsit

original: ma ma rol thu ril ril /_ma ma las myur du mdzod/_dgra bo'i klad pa la ya/
analyzed: ma ma rol thu ril ril /_ma ma las myur du mdzod/_dgra bo'i klad pa la ya/
translated: Mama rol thu ril ril, Mama las myur du mdzod, Dgra bo’i klad pa la ya,

original: snying la ya/_dbang po la ya/_ma mo snying la thun b+h+yoh/_ma kha d+har ma mo bye/_om🔽b+hi tshi sa ti sa ma ya du stan rbad/_a ka ri sems sa lu shing na li rbad/_kha
analyzed: snying la ya/_dbang po la ya/_ma mo snying la thun b+h+yoh/_ma kha d+har ma mo bye/_om b+hi tshi sa ti sa ma ya du stan rbad/_a ka ri sems sa lu shing na li rbad/_kha
translated: Snying la ya, dbang po la ya, Ma mo snying la thun bhyo ha, Ma kha dhar ma mo byed, Om🔽Bhi tsi sa ti sa ma ya du stan rbad, A ka ri sems sa lu shing na li rbad, Kha

original: d+has tsha mi la sbyo rbad 'u rbad khrag ra rbad myos te ba slo bshas ti kam/_bsnyen
analyzed: d+has tsha mi la sbyo rbad 'u rbad khrag ra rbad myos te ba slo bshas ti kam/_bsnyen
translated: Dhas tsa mi la sbyor rbad ’u rbad khrag ra rbad myos te ba slob shas ti kam, Bsnyen

original: bsgrub las sbyor thun sngags so/
analyzed: bsgrub las sbyor thun sngags so/
translated: Sgrub las sbyor thun sngags so.🔽  Having accomplished it in that way, when the signs of the death of the victim have appeared, now one should apply it to the action.

original: de ltar bsgrub pas bsgrub bya ste/_/sod pa'i rtag mtshhan thon pa dang / da ni las la sbyar bar bya/_/sha khrag gtor ma bzang du bsham/_/sha ling khrag
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub pas bsgrub bya ste/_/sod pa'i rtag mtshhan thon pa dang / da ni las la sbyar bar bya/_/sha khrag gtor ma bzang du bsham/_/sha ling khrag
translated: Arrange a good bali of flesh and blood, a fresh flesh linga and a blood linga,

original: ling ling gsar dang /_/ling gsum dum bur gtub nas kyang /_/tshher ma'i
analyzed: ling ling gsar dang /_/ling gsum dum bur gtub nas kyang /_/tshher ma'i
translated: and having cut the three lingas into pieces,🔽in a pile of dry wood, light a fire.🔽  The face of the fire god generated as a goddess,

original: shing brtshegs gshen me sbyar/_/me lha lha mor bskyed pa'i zhal/_/sgrub bya bsreg
analyzed: shing brtshegs gshen me sbyar/_/me lha lha mor bskyed pa'i zhal/_/sgrub bya bsreg
translated: burn the victim.

original: cing sngags 'di brjod/_/om hum shi ya de bi ka li ka li ma ha ka li hum b+h+ya b+h+yoh/_ma
analyzed: cing sngags 'di brjod/_/om hum shi ya de bi ka li ka li ma ha ka li hum b+h+ya b+h+yoh/_ma
translated: Om hum shiva devi kali kali maha kali hum bhyo bhyo ha.

original: ma sha trung a mu kam ma ra ya ud man ti hum phat/_brgya 'am stong ci nus gcig
analyzed: ma sha trung a mu kam ma ra ya ud man ti hum phat/_brgya 'am stong ci nus gcig
translated: Recite this one hundred or one thousand times, or as much as you can.🔽After the offerings and praises, the fire god departs.

original: brjod/_/mchod bstod mthar ni me lha gshegs/_/de nas thal ba dur sar
analyzed: brjod/_/mchod bstod mthar ni me lha gshegs/_/de nas thal ba dur sar
translated: Then, bury the ashes in a charnel ground.

original: mnan/_/de ni las sbyor rim pa'o/
analyzed: mnan/_/de ni las sbyor rim pa'o/
translated: This is the sequence of the application of the rite.

original: de ltar byas pas bstan dgra rnams/_/zhag bdun dag gis 'chi bar
analyzed: de ltar byas pas bstan dgra rnams/_/zhag bdun dag gis 'chi bar
translated: By doing this, enemies of the doctrine will die within seven days.

original: 'gyur/_/'di med gdams pa phyi ma rnams/_/mtshhon cha med pa'i dmag
analyzed: 'gyur/_/'di med gdams pa phyi ma rnams/_/mtshhon cha med pa'i dmag
translated: Without this, the later instructions are like an army without weapons🔽or a body without a heart.

original: dang mtshhungs/_/snying med pa'i lus bzhin no/_/de bas gsang bsgrub rab tu
analyzed: dang mtshhungs/_/snying med pa'i lus bzhin no/_/de bas gsang bsgrub rab tu
translated: Therefore, keep the secret practice very well.

original: gces/_/srung bzlog zhi rgyas las rnams kun/_/bla ma'i zhal la dri zhing
analyzed: gces/_/srung bzlog zhi rgyas las rnams kun/_/bla ma'i zhal la dri zhing
translated: Inquire into and examine all the rites of protection, averting, pacifying, and enriching with the guru's mouth.

original: brtags/_/dpal ldan lha mo'i gsang sgrub 'di/_/dpal ldan lha mos byer
analyzed: brtags/_/dpal ldan lha mo'i gsang sgrub 'di/_/dpal ldan lha mos byer
translated: This secret practice of the glorious goddess was given by the glorious goddess🔽to Virava.

original: wa pa la gnang /_/de nas nag po pa nas til+lor brgyud/_/na ro pas zhus mar
analyzed: wa pa la gnang /_/de nas nag po pa nas til+lor brgyud/_/na ro pas zhus mar
translated: Then, it was passed down from Krishna to Tilopa, and Naropa requested it.

original: pa bdag la gnang /_/'di ni gcig rgyud dam pa yin/_/spel ba'i gnas🔽med shin tu gsang /_/dpal ldan lha mo'i gsang sgrub rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen
analyzed: pa bdag la gnang /_/'di ni gcig rgyud dam pa yin/_/spel ba'i gnas med shin tu gsang /_/dpal ldan lha mo'i gsang sgrub rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen
translated: This is the one tantra of the sublime one,🔽and there is no place for proliferation. It is extremely secret.

original: po dpal na ro pas mdzad cing /_bod kyi lotsh+tshha ba mar pa chos kyis blo gros kyis
analyzed: po dpal na ro pas mdzad cing /_bod kyi lotsh+tshha ba mar pa chos kyis blo gros kyis
translated: The Secret Sādhana of the Glorious Goddess, composed by the great Indian scholar Śrī Nāropa,

original: bsgyur zhing zhus pa'o rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: bsgyur zhing zhus pa'o rdzogs so//_//
translated: and translated and revised by the Tibetan translator Marpa Chökyi Lodrö.

original: dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
analyzed: dpal ldan lha mo chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
translated: The Secret Sādhana of the Great Goddess Śrī Mahādevī
